actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to extend the low-income housing credit for certain buildings in high cost areas.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to qualify buildings that provide a community service facility and are located within 1000 feet of a qualified census tract (designated low-income area) for the increased low-income housing tax credit for buildings in high cost areas.

titles.title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to extend the low-income housing credit for certain buildings in high cost areas.
